import React, { useState } from "react"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; function AddEmploye(props) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [role, setRole] = useState(""); const [img, setImg] = useState(""); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); function subHandler(e) { e.preventDefault(); props.updateEmployee(props.id, name, role); setName(""); setRole(""); setImg(""); } return (

setName(e.target.value)} />

); } export default AddEmploye;
